item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row row_padding_top="160" row_padding_bottom="140"][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text text_animation="fade-in-bottom" text_animation_delay="100"]

Hi, Im Daniel Moeller, I come from Portugal, my early artistic influences ranged from Modern Art, New Wave and Abstract Art.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4" offset="vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4 vc_col-xs-2"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="3/4" offset="vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-8 vc_col-xs-10"][socialLink sociallink_type="behance" sociallink_url="#"][socialLink sociallink_type="dribbble" sociallink_url="#"][socialLink sociallink_type="instagram" sociallink_url="#"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/12" offset="vc_col-lg-2 vc_col-md-1"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="full_width"][vc_column][ep_gallery title_bar="hide" filter_display="hide" portfolio_filter="custom" filters="fashion,life-style,nature" portfolio_hover_style="darkStyle" enterance_animation="zoomIn"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.content:encoded:

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [vc_row row_type="interactive_background" equal_height="true" full_height="true" columns_placement="bottom" background_img_id="EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID" overlay_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.01)"][vc_column width="1/12" vertical_position="middle" offset="vc_col-lg-2 vc_col-xs-1"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/6" vertical_position="middle" offset="vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-xs-10"][textbox title="Hello Im Daniel Moeller!" title_color="#ffffff" title_fontsize="48" text_under_align="center" subtitle="PHOTOGRAPHER & DEVELOPER" subtitle_color="#ffffff" text_content="Our team members are a bunch of young creative programmers that are new to ThemeForest but are experienced in the field of programming and web design. We want the best for our customers." content_align="center" content_fontsize="14" text_content_color="#ffffff"][vc_empty_space][vc_single_image image="EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID" img_size="full" alignment="center"][vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6" offset="vc_hidden-xs"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6" offset="vc_col-xs-3"][socialLink sociallink_url="#" vertical_position="middle" offset="vc_col-lg-2 vc_col-xs-1"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row background_color="#161616" row_padding_top="70" row_padding_bottom="70"][vc_column width="1/4"][piechart piechart_percent="86" main_color="#ffffff" piechart_color_preset="2e2e2e" title="SEO Optimized" title_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.9)" subtitle="The SEO optimizations we made, leads search engine flow to your website" subtitle_color="#adadad"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][piechart piechart_percent="70" main_color="#ffffff" piechart_color_preset="2e2e2e" title="Bug Fixed" title_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.85)" subtitle="We fixed every bug we found in our way, still working on fixing issues" subtitle_color="#adadad"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][piechart piechart_percent="89" main_color="#ffffff" piechart_color_preset="2e2e2e" title="Minimalistic Design" title_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.9)" subtitle="A design to let you focus on products instead of colors, design or animations" subtitle_color="#adadad"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][piechart piechart_percent="95" main_color="#ffffff" piechart_color_preset="2e2e2e" title="Fully Ajaxified" title_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.85)" subtitle="Feel ajax in each interaction, first fully Ajaxified theme on ThemeForest" subtitle_color="#adadad"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Contact
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row row_padding_top="160"][vc_column width="1/12" offset="vc_col-lg-2 vc_col-md-2"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/6" offset="vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-8"][vc_column_text]

I am always looking for new projects. Fell free to say hello.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_margin_top="50"][vc_column width="1/12" offset="vc_col-lg-2 vc_col-md-2"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/12" offset="vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4"][custom_textbox title="Tell:" title_color="#ffffff" text_content="Monday-Friday 7:00AM-4:00PM 0097143564356 , 0097143564357" content_fontsize="13" text_content_color="#ffffff" bg_color="#4664ea" border_color="#4664ea"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/12" offset="vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4"][custom_textbox title="Email:" title_color="#ffffff" text_content="Answering would take 0-2 working days support(at)epicomedia.net help.epicomedia(at)gmail.com" content_fontsize="13" text_content_color="#ffffff" bg_color="#141414" border_color="#141414"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/12" offset="vc_col-lg-2 vc_col-md-2"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_margin_top="50" row_margin_bottom="100"][vc_column width="1/12" offset="vc_col-lg-2 vc_col-md-2"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/6" offset="vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-8"][contact-form-7 id="EPICO_DEMO_CF7_ID"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/12" offset="vc_col-lg-2 vc_col-md-2"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
